game.name: Terradune
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Terradune is a hand-drawn 2D action RPG where you battle monsters, discover hidden treasures, and shape your hero’s fate. Explore scorching deserts, moonlit forests, and thrilling dungeons to uncover secrets in this fast-paced, immersive adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Terradune is a hand-drawn 2D action RPG where you battle monsters, discover hidden treasures, and shape your hero’s fate. Explore scorching deserts, moonlit forests, and thrilling dungeons to uncover secrets in this fast-paced, immersive adventure.
